name: caster
description: A simple audio podcast manager and hosting
author: Dewitt Buckingham <dj729@comcast.net>

scripts.preversion: git checkout master && git merge --no-ff develop -m 'Pull changes for release bump'
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && git checkout develop && git merge --no-ff master -m 'Sync Develop branch' && git push
